channel.description: could anyone enter a code for the farming ability even 1 seed farming is enough because i can fix it to all seeds after i got just 1 farming code (please tell also where to put that...yes i know it must be in client.java but where there and do i need another file edited too?! :|

item.title: Farming adding (great thing!)
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

laveerre:

could anyone enter a code for the farming ability even 1 seed farming is enough because i can fix it to all seeds after i got just 1 farming code (please tell also where to put that…yes i know it must be in client.java but where there and do i need another file edited too?!

I created a whole separate class called “UseItem” to cut down client size, and it’s easier to manage. I inserted all my method relating to using an item with something else. I suggest you do the same.

use item on item
use item on object
use item on player
use item on npc

Also this is not a spoon-feeding community. Which has been repeated much to often.

You give us a snippet to start off with instead of us giving you a whole method.

Read full topic

item.title: Farming adding (great thing!)
item.dc:creator: @_Jayden1 `Jayden.
item.description:
@_Jayden1 wrote:

[i]Um, Client.java is the only file needed for this, If you wanted like seeds to give you herbs and stuff, thats all in client.java I have a perfect farming method, I’ll give you the start of it, To give you an idea.

This is the farming bit.[/i]

if(ItemID == 5295 && UsedOnObjectID == 7965){ farm(40, 257, 5295, 3000); }

257 = The Ranarr weed after you use it on the patch
5295 = The seed ID
3000 = The exp rate.

Bare in mind that the farming patch is the one in falador park.

Read full topic
